name: ROOTed (luximo55)
description:
This game was created as a project on the 48 hour Global Game Jam Novska. This year's theme was roots, and because GGJ had to release the theme early, our local game jam theme was unusual roots.

The "Story":

A man lost in a forest tries to find his way out. He saw monsters along the way knowing what was waiting for him. He was ready to fight them. After some time wandering through the forest, he realizes he's stuck. He was constantly going along the same paths, beating the same monsters. 

How to play:

Use WASD keys to move the character. Use the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to shoot.
